Description: Fragment of flattened handle at neck join, with gradual turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine red-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '178'. Name Kleisimbrotos? Same die is used for an example in the Benaki collection, Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (120)
